channel.title: Does Jagex ever IP ban?
channel.description: I was wondering, does Jagex ever IP ban? I have a slightly dynamic IP, it changes like once every 3 months... so I kinda don't want to try deob'd clients with new accounts if it's dangerous to my main.

item.title: Does Jagex ever IP ban?
item.dc:creator: @xxlegitxx xxlegitxx
item.description:
@xxlegitxx wrote:

Tor works beautifully as a proxy.

Read full topic

HE GRAVE DIGGED A DAY OLD TOPIC!

…Durial was not IP banned, his account was locked, then banned. Now he uses his pure to play the game.

3 day old

^^[/quote]
who cares? i like grave digging

~XDZ

item.title: Does Jagex ever IP ban?
item.dc:creator: @Stroud Stroud
item.description:
@Stroud wrote:

[quote=“exe626, post:20, topic:140981”]Stroud, he was saying there was never a mass ban,
“the only time there was a mass bann was fally massacre. like 10 ppl got banned cause they bug abused”
Thats what I’m talking about.[/quote]

Oh. that was a total level of fagness to whoever said that 10 people was a mass ban lol.

found it it was madhockey! what a fag…

a mass ban is like 1,000+ people…

ive been aplying since 2005, and i sitll have my rubber chicken and yoyo and scythe if u dont bleieve me.

i remember when they said that they mass banned a bunch of people and actually gave some of the players’ names lol

Read full topic

item.title: Does Jagex ever IP ban?
item.dc:creator: @exe626 exe626
item.description:
@exe626 wrote:

The only reason you would get banned from using a SCAR bot is being level >30 because it could take an hour to get that level and they know these are very disposable accounts. If you look around you’ll find tons of level 100+ autoers.

Read full topic

item.title: Does Jagex ever IP ban?
item.dc:creator: @bobby Bobby
item.description:
@bobby wrote:

thye can detect them. poeple do get banned from scar but it is less of a chance than hte other bots.

Read full topic

item.title: Does Jagex ever IP ban?
item.dc:creator: @The_Un-Named The Un-Named
item.description:
@The_Un-Named wrote:

[quote=“xxlegitxx, post:10, topic:140981”][quote author=The Un-Named link=topic=193218.msg1753666#msg1753666 date=1189699869]
They do, actually. Not by using SCAR, or IBot, stuff they can’t detect, but if you have a GOOD program like Aryan, or the early days of Ares, you WILL get IP banned for prolonged abuse of it.
[/quote]

They absolutely cannot detect SCAR/IBot?[/quote]

I know they can’t on SCAR, it’s more lack of humanness that gives it away.

Read full topic

item.title: Does Jagex ever IP ban?
item.dc:creator: @xxlegitxx xxlegitxx
item.description:
@xxlegitxx wrote:

The Un-Named:

They do, actually. Not by using SCAR, or IBot, stuff they can’t detect, but if you have a GOOD program like Aryan, or the early days of Ares, you WILL get IP banned for prolonged abuse of it.

They absolutely cannot detect SCAR/IBot?

Read full topic

item.title: Does Jagex ever IP ban?
item.dc:creator: @The_Un-Named The Un-Named
item.description:
@The_Un-Named wrote:

exe626:

They don’t IP ban for macroing 24/7.

They do, actually. Not by using SCAR, or IBot, stuff they can’t detect, but if you have a GOOD program like Aryan, or the early days of Ares, you WILL get IP banned for prolonged abuse of it.

Read full topic

item.title: Does Jagex ever IP ban?
item.dc:creator: @exe626 exe626
item.description:
@exe626 wrote:

They don’t IP ban for macroing 24/7. IP bans only come around once or twice a year when epic hacks are made. When they find them(usually within the first 24 hours) they are gone for good. When they post videos on Youtube of them hacking, Jagex has the video removed. Its their way to show that they are too good to be hacked.

Read full topic

item.title: Does Jagex ever IP ban?
item.dc:creator: @Zameix Zameix
item.description:
@Zameix wrote:

They have just i.p banned me. Well i think that’s the term for it. They have permenantly banned every single account i have ever logged into. One having 140m on it from the previous week of phishing. So it kinda sooked.

Read full topic

item.title: Does Jagex ever IP ban?
item.dc:creator: @The_Un-Named The Un-Named
item.description:
@The_Un-Named wrote:

[quote=“Casey., post:5, topic:140981”][quote author=The Un-Named link=topic=193218.msg1737203#msg1737203 date=1189166651]
They do, on rare occasions.

Basically, unless your abusing the game with multiple macros 24/7, you probably won’t get IP banned.

However, be careful, I’m sure after a set number of bans, they flag all accounts using your IP & UID.
[/quote]
I run 24/7, and have yet to be Ip banned.(Using multiple accounts off three computers)[/quote]

I mean on something with the power of aryan, using direct client edits.

Read full topic
